Class Species

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.Species
public class Species extends Object
Enumeration of all possible sequences of length n with m disaccharides. This class facilitates the generation of linear equality constraints based on molecular species sequences.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Species(int m, int n)
    Enumerates all possible sequences of length n with m disaccharides.

    • Species

      public Species(int m, int n)
      Enumerates all possible sequences of length n with m disaccharides.
      Parameters:
      m - Number of disaccharides.
      n - BKHS chain length.

  • Method Details

    • loadGamma

      public static double[][] loadGamma(String file)
      Loads the matrix Gamma of a N&I model from a tab-delimited ASCII file.
      Parameters:
      file - ASCII file with header row: position \t u \t s.
      Returns:
      Matrix Gamma representing the N&I model.

    • loadFragAbund

      public static double[] loadFragAbund(String file)
      Loads fragment length abundances for a heparinase digest from a tab-delimited ASCII file.
      Parameters:
      file - ASCII file with header row: length \t abundance.
      Returns:
      Array of fragment length abundances.

    • testNormCons

      public static void testNormCons(String inDir)
      Performs testing of the sum-to-1 constraint using a N&I model.
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
